body:
## What happened

Update AS and plugins, open existing project

## Version information

Android Studio `3.6` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 43.0.2` • Dart plugin `192.7761`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

null

```
com.intellij.configurationStore.UnknownMacroException: Unknown macro $PROJECT_FILE$

title: Updated AS 3.6 and plugins got exception
